TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Legend extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图表图像的图例。

span.span: Represents the legend for the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将封装的所有功能控件的图例，并使用公开根的集合属性对象。The class encapsulates all the functionality of the control's legend, and is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意数量的图表图像的图例。There can be any number of legends for a chart image. 图例可以：Legends can: - 停靠和对齐。Be docked and aligned. - 显示内部或外部绘制的图表区。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 自动适应其内容。Automatically fit their contents. - 使用预定义的样式，如行、 列或表。Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table. - 使用阴影、 渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 可调整大小和放置在图表图像内的任何位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image. 图例项由对象，并包括默认值或自定义项。Legend items are represented by the object, and are either default or custom items. 自定义项不相关联的数据，并可以添加、 删除和修改使用属性。Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the property. 默认项是自动添加到图例中，默认情况下，圆环图和饼图绘制的数据点的名称。Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts. 对于所有其他图表类型，默认项是绘制的数据系列的名称。For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series. 每个序列都有属性，用于定义将使用的图例的名称。Each series has a property that defines the name of the legend that will be used. 图例项将不会创建一系列如果属性设置为`false`。A legend item will not be created for a series if the property is set to `false`. 可以使用更改这些默认项的文本属性。The text for these default items can be changed using the property. 此属性将允许你指定预定义的关键字将替换为在运行时及其相应值。This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time. 如果有一个饼图，并设置属性，它还将设置图例文本设置标签的值。If you have a pie chart and you set the property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels. 如果你想要将文本设置为不同的值，则可以设置属性。If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the property. 在大多数情况下，你会想要设置属性设置为"#AXISLABEL"或"#VALX"。In most cases, you would want to set the property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX". 图例系列符号是矩形、 点或线条。Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines. 符号类型的图表会自动设置，并取决于绘制的图表类型。The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type. 默认情况下的图例文本自动调整大小。Legend text by default is automatically sized. 可以通过禁用来禁用自动调整大小的图例文本属性。You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the property. 当此属性设置为`false`，图例文本的大小由图例的大小属性。When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend . 如果属性已启用，属性确定图例项可以在调整大小时的最小字号。If the property is enabled, the property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing. 属性定义上的文本换行到另一行之前可以在一行显示的字符数限制。The property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line. 如果不希望在图例文本换行，将的值设置属性设置为零。If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the property to zero. 默认情况下，如果整个图例文本无法显示在图例中，文本将被截断。By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated. 可以设置图例以获取文本换行而不被截断。You can set the on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated. 如果将图例的内容无法放入给定的区域，图例项将被截断。If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated. 省略号显示以指示有多于图例的空间更多的项。An ellipsis is shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for. 若要避免的图例项被截断，将设置的位置和大小的图例使用属性。To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the property. 设置图例的位置或大小时, 图表可以不再自动定位在图表中的元素。When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart. 在某些情况下，很多需要手动定位其他图表元素，以获得所需的外观。In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance. 另一种方法是定义而不是使用默认图例设置自己单元格的列。Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings. 对象具有 CellColumn 集合; 每个 CellColumn 对象表示在图例中的列。The object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend. 某个单元格的列和属性，可用于调整列的大小。A cell column has and properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns. 图例包含多个条目时可用于提高可读性。When the legend contains many entries, can be used to improve readability. 当此属性设置为 True 时，它将显示您可以使用设置背景色属性。When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the property. 默认情况下，图例位于图表的右上角。By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart. 此位置可以通过修改和图例的属性。This position can be modified by using the and properties of the legend. 图例还可以通过使用与图表区相关联属性。The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the property. 此属性指定应为其停靠图例的图表区的名称。This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked. 此外，属性可以用于显示图表区的图例。In addition, the property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area. 当设置为 False，属性定义的最大大小，以百分比表示，当自动定位图例时可用的图表中图例。When is set to False, the property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned. 如果你想要调整宽度或高度的图例停靠属性已设置后，应设置此属性。This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set. 可以使用修改图例事件。The legend can be modified using the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 一个 .NET Framework 枚举值，该值表示图例的对齐方式。

span.span: A .NET Framework enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这样便可以对齐图例，或; 也会影响其对齐属性设置。The legend can be aligned so that it is , or ; its alignment is also affected by the property setting. 如果图例停靠在顶部或底部是在左侧，如果左侧或右侧，停靠位于顶部。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, is at the top. 属性设置恰好相反，并将对齐到右侧或底部，具体取决于停靠位置的图例。The property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked. 始终中心图例中，垂直或水平。 always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally. 设置属性将具有不起作用，如果属性未设置为。Setting the property will have no effect if the property is not set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，表示图例的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of a legend.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值将是如果您已经指定的背景的渐变颜色，则使用第一种颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 即，如果使用的 alpha 值为 0-没有颜色将分配给图例的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the legend. 因此，在后台将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示图例的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否图例将显示渐变，并在使用一个确定的渐变的方向。Use the property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 设置与图例背景主色属性。Set the primary color of the legend background with the property. 设置与图例背景的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color of the legend background with the property. 将此项设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示图例的阴影类型。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的线条组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **请注意**阴影线条的颜色由属性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径图例中，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位的图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 此外可以指定一个通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像可以来自任何支持的.NET Framework 中，包括图标的有效图形文件。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，例如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the background image alignment.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图例; 的背景图像的对齐方式它是应用的时，才属性设置为。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the property is set to .

value.span: 一个将显示为透明效果的 值。

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of a legend background image.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the drawing mode of a legend background image.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何显示该图像; 图像可以平铺，缩放，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合将图例的边界内。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend. 如果图像平铺，则从图例的左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend. 有关可用的换行模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，表示绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的许多辅助背景色对象，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。The property determines the secondary background color of many objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定图例的阴影线条的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend. 若要使用的图例背景渐变色：To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - 设置与基本色属性。Set the primary color with the property. - 设置使用的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定要用于边框的线条样式。The property determines the line style to use for a border. 在行可以是纯色、 线和等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 对于其他边框样式，请参阅枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，属性还可以设置线条的宽度为折线图，显示与"行"样式和等的自定义图例项此类元素中。Note that property can also set the width of lines in such elements as line charts, custom legend items displayed with a "line" style, and so forth.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可停靠到顶部、 左、 底部或向右整个图表图像或内部或外部的图表区。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果属性设置为`false`，停靠适用于整个图表图像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果属性设置为`true`，停靠适用于由指定的对象属性If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 此属性如果不起作用属性未设置为。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将出现编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，您必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置 Legend.Font.Size 属性属性将设置为 false。If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the property will be set to false. 此外，如果您设置属性设为 true，此属性将重置为其默认值，即 8 磅。Also, if you set the property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定图例项显示顺序的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

summary.span: 此属性仅对自动添加到图表序列中的图例项有效；对自定义图例项无效。

span.span: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，用于指定图例项显示顺序。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为，如果使用 StackedColumn、 StackedColumn100、 StackedArea 或 StackedArea100 图表类型，将自动反转图例。If the property is set to , the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle LegendStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值可确定图例样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the legend style.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，图例显示为一系列的表中的项。By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table. 您可以指定是否通过设置展开表中的项宽度还是高度属性。You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the property. 当属性设置为，则控件将确定是否绘制宽表或长表，具体取决于对齐方式和图表的位置。When the property is set to , the control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart. 这可能会导致要使用多个图例项列绘制的图例。This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns. 有三个可能的图例的样式： 列、 行和表。There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table. 请参阅下表中的这些样式的摘要：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |样式Style|描述Description| |-|-| |列Column|在一列，并且多个行中显示图例项。Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows. 最常用于当图例停靠在图表左侧或右侧。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |行Row|一个行，使用多个列中显示图例项。Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns. 最常用于当图例停靠到顶部或底部的图表时。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |表Table|使用多个列和行显示图例项。Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的最大大小（以图表区域的百分比形式表示）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.

summary.span: 此值由自动布局算法使用。

span.span: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.

value.span: 一个值，该值表示图例的最大大小。

span.span: A value that represents the maximum size of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图例停靠到图表区的左右，此属性确定图例，以图表区的百分比形式表示的最大宽度。If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area. 如果图例停靠在顶部或底部，此属性确定图例，还以百分比形式表示的最大高度。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于获取或设置图例位置的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which can be used to get or set the position of the legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the position of the legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性自动设置（即 Legend.Position.Auto = `true`）由 控件计算的图例位置，则考虑 、 和 属性设置。If the property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) the legend position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不自动设置，则将忽略 、 和 属性，图例位置仅由返回的 对象的值确定。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现"真实"隐藏效果;请尝试"128,0,0,0"阴影的颜色值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现阴影效果，将此属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致向下和向右; 移动阴影负值将导致一个向上和向左移动的阴影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

summary.span: 获取或设置可在文本换行前在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示在文本换行前可在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 默认值为 25。

span.span: The default value is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例文本超出此属性指定的值，当遇到下一个空白字符时，将自动包装文本。When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next white-space character is encountered. 如果在文本中不有任何空格字符，则不会包装的文本。Text will not be wrapped if there are no white-space characters in the text. 设置属性设置为 0 可以禁用该功能。Set the property to zero to disable the feature.

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例标题的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend title.

value.span: 指示图例标题的字体的 对象。

span.span: A object that specifies font for the legend title.

value.span: 默认值为“Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt, Bold”。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt, Bold".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于设置图例标题的字体属性。This property can be used to set font properties of the legend title. 如果您尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将出现编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，您必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.
